name: EBMA - EUROPEAN BICYCLE MANUFACTURERS ASSOCIATION
goal: Bicycle Advocacy, Creating many more thousands more Green Jobs in EU, Enhancing Bicycle Infrastructure in EU, Keeping, enchancing, increasing EU Bicycle Industry in Europe with current 600 SMEs and over 60/70.000 against unfair competitions
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
